sources.title: Undercover Man
sources.description: Title: Undercover Man Summary: A bandit who robs both Americans and Mexicans is causing each side of the border to blame the other. Hoppy has to settle matters. Directed by: Lesley Selander Actors: William Boyd, Andy Clyde, Jay Kirby Production Company: Harry Sherman Productions Release Date: 23 October 1942 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Hoppy is sent for to see if he can find the outlaw gang working both sides of the border. The gang leader, sometimes dressed as Hoppy and sometimes as Gonzales, has the two sides suspecting each other. But finding an old wanted poster, Hoppy sets a trap.

metadata.Plot: Hoppy is sent for to see if he can find the outlaw gang working both sides of the border. The gang leader, sometimes dressed as Hoppy and sometimes as Gonzales, has the two sides suspecting each other. But finding an old wanted poster, Hoppy sets a trap.
metadata.Writer: J. Benton Cheney, Clarence E. Mulford
metadata.Actors: William Boyd, Andy Clyde, Jay Kirby
